descripcion:
• We are looking to hire a group of front-end developers to join our team.

    We aim to train this group of developers into Salesforce marketing cloud analyst. The candidates must be willing to be trained during the weekends for 10 weeks. During the duration of the training, your free days will be weekdays.

    This is what we look for:

    -You must have experience with HTML, CSS, and Javascript

    -Experience in Node.Js would be ideal but not required

    -Minimum 1 year of proven experience, 2 years preferred (we'll contact your previous employer)

    -Some marketing background is preferred

    -Must be able to speak (and write) English fluently

    You can work from home.
